original_text: The Lord will send you away to live among foreign people. When they see what has happened to you, they will all see that it is terrible. They will tell stories about you and they will laugh at you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너를 끌어 가시는 모든 민족 중에서 네가 놀람과 속담과 비방거리가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will send you away
When they see what has happened to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신에게 일어난 일을 볼 때

sentences.original_text: they will all see that it is terrible
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 그것이 끔찍하다는 것을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will tell stories about you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신에 대한 이야기를 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will laugh at you
